name: Witch Maker
description:
"Double, double, toil and trouble,
Fire burn and cauldron bubble!"

The witching season is upon us, so it's time to choose... what kind of witch will YOU be?! Venture out to that mysterious cabin in the woods and create your own unique witchy look!

Features:

  • Dozens of clothing options for today's fashionable witch!
  • Numerous body shapes! Masculine and feminine styles! It's the 21st century, anyone can be a witch!
  • Calm, soothing sounds! No frights or jump scares, just a nice chill time!

Links:

Game: Alex Ilitchev (http://ilitchev.tumblr.com/)
Background: Peggy Shi (http://www.pegushi.com/)
Fonts: Divide By Zero (http://fonts.tom7.com/) and Angel Koziupa + Ale Paul (https://www.sudtipos.com/)
